actionTemplate.title: Make thick lips look thinner with an inner M-shape
steps: Use concealer to cover the outer lip line slightly
On the upper lip, draw an inner M-shape with lip color
On the lower lip, apply color only inside the natural lip line
Blur outward with finger or lip brush to a soft edge
Clean the corners for a neat finish

rationaleTemplate: Pulling color inward reduces visual lip volume
Soft blur keeps it natural instead of looking erased
